scripts.build: ncc build source/ojsonserver.js -o dist --minify --no-cache&&powershell copy dist/index.js dist/ojsonserver.js&&powershell Remove-Item dist/index.js&&powershell copy source/ojsonserver.ps1 dist/ojsonserver.ps1&&powershell Copy-Item -Path source/.githubsecrets/* -Destination dist/.githubsecrets/ -Recurse&&powershell copy source/option.executer.json dist/option.executer.json
scripts.b: ncc build source/ojsonserver.js -o dist --minify --no-cache&&powershell copy dist/index.js dist/ojsonserver.js&&powershell Remove-Item dist/index.js&&powershell copy source/ojsonserver.ps1 dist/ojsonserver.ps1&&powershell Copy-Item -Path source/.githubsecrets/* -Destination dist/.githubsecrets/ -Recurse&&powershell copy source/option.executer.json dist/option.executer.json
